articles.description: Kansas coach Bill Self discusses his program's consistency and the challenges the Jayhawks are facing in trying to win their 14th consecutive Big 12 title.
articles.headline: Self: Harder to win Big 12 this year over previous seasons

images.caption: Kansas coach Bill Self discusses his program's consistency and the challenges the Jayhawks are facing in trying to win their 14th consecutive Big 12 title.
images.name: Self: Harder to win Big 12 this year over previous seasons

articles.description: Jay Williams has help from a young fan dressed like James Naismith as he makes his pick for the Big-12 showdown between West Virginia and Kansas.
articles.headline: Williams, Naismith Kid make WVU-Kansas picks

images.caption: Jay Williams has help from a young fan dressed like James Naismith as he makes his pick for the Big-12 showdown between West Virginia and Kansas.
images.name: Williams, Naismith Kid make WVU-Kansas picks

articles.description: Jay Williams, Jay Bilas and Seth Greenberg weigh in on the impact of an ongoing FBI investigation into college basketball on bribes and corruption.
articles.headline: Greenberg not expecting 'massive changes' from FBI investigation

images.caption: Jay Williams, Jay Bilas and Seth Greenberg weigh in on the impact of an ongoing FBI investigation into college basketball on bribes and corruption.
images.name: Greenberg not expecting 'massive changes' from FBI investigation

articles.description: Kansas graduate Rob Riggle puts the Jayhawks into the "Circle of Tournament Trust."
articles.headline: Riggle shows love for the Jayhawks

articles.description: Where do we stand in the move toward the legalization of sports betting in the United States? Here is ESPN Chalk's one-stop shop of all relevant content, as we await to Supreme Court's ruling on the New Jersey case.
articles.headline: Legalization of sports betting landing page

images.caption: On December 4, the United States Supreme Court will hear what could be an historic case, Christie v. NCAA, which has the potential to change sports betting in the country.
images.name: The fight for sports betting heads to Supreme Court

videos.description: Luke Maye misses a layup and Garrison Brooks grabs the rebound and slams it down for UNC.
videos.headline: Brooks elevates for putback dunk

videos.description: As UNC trails Wake Forest, Luke Maye battles for an offensive rebound and puts it back in for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Maye shows determination with putback bucket

videos.description: Theo Pinson flies in to grab the offensive board and then is knocked down as he lays in the bucket.
videos.headline: Pinson lays out for and-1 layup

videos.description: Joel Berry II pulls up and then uses the shot fake before he sinks a long-range jump shot.
videos.headline: Berry fakes out defender on jumper

videos.description: Kenny Williams forces a turnover and then finishes with a big dunk for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Williams steals and throws down for UNC

videos.description: Brandon Childress feeds the ball to Doral Moore who finishes with a slam to cut UNC's lead.
videos.headline: Wake Forest answers with Moore dunk

videos.description: Bryant Crawford beats three defenders on his way to the basket for the lay in to extend Wake Forest's lead vs. No. 13 UNC.
videos.headline: Crawford makes tough layup for Wake Forest

videos.description: Joel Berry II sinks a runner to put UNC in the lead in the final seconds to avoid a loss vs. Wake Forest.
videos.headline: Berry drops game-winning floater
